events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
The candidate's profile has been categorized under the Engineering department based on their experience and skills in software development.
A recruiter has been assigned to guide the candidate through upcoming stages of the hiring process for the software engineer role.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call, during which the candidate demonstrated strong foundational knowledge in software engineering.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team to assess the candidate's coding and problem-solving skills.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, impressing the panel with their proficiency in software development concepts.
An HR interview has been scheduled to further discuss the candidate’s cultural fit and employment terms.
The HR interview was completed successfully, and the candidate expressed strong interest in joining the engineering team.
An employment offer has been proposed to the candidate, including details about compensation, benefits, and start date.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and requested clarifications about the onboarding process.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed their availability to start according to the proposed timeline.
The onboarding process has commenced, including access provisioning and orientation sessions tailored for new engineering hires.
The recruitment case has been successfully closed following the candidate’s full integration into the engineering team.
